text: HI GOOD MORNING
Good morning, how are you?
FINE, HOW ABOUT YOU, AND MANY CHILDREN ARE DYING.
I am fine, thanks!  Yes, surely there is a good charity that can help children.  Do you know of a good one?
YES, I KNOW THE BEST CHARITY , THAT NAME IS SAVE THE CHILDREN, DO YOU KNOW THE CHARITY.
Yes, I am thinking of donating to a childrens charity and I can now consider Save The Children.   How much is a good donation that could help?
ITS A VERY GOOD CHARITY, I SO MANY TIMES DONATE THEM THE MONEY ARE ANY THINGS DIRECTLY GO THE CHILDREN ONLY.
Ok, good to know!  Thanks!  I will donate $100 to them today.  Are you going to donate also?
YES I ALSO DONATE 50 DOLLAR TO THEM AND I AM VERY TO DONATE THEM AND THANK YOU  FOR  DONATE.
Do you know what kind of services they will provide with the money?
THEY GIVE THE EDUCATION, FOOD, CLOTHS ,ETC.,
That's great!  I have considered donating to St Jude also because they provide life saving medical care.  Have you heard of them?
YES, I KNOW THAT.
Have you ever donated to them?
YES, I MONTHLY DONATE THE CHILDREN.
That's great of you!  I think I will donate to them today too.  Do you know of any other childrens charities?
I DO NOT THE OTHER CHARITIES.
I am sceptical of many of them but if you recommend Save The Children and I know that St Judd's is trustworthy, then that's where my money will go today
89% MEMBER RECOMMEND THE CHARITIES.
That's impressive.  I wonder what the member recommendation is for St Jude
